revised_title: The Influence of Central Nervous System on Regeneration in Gunda ulvse
tldr: This study investigates the role of the central nervous system in the regeneration of the Triclad Planarian Gunda ulvse. It finds that anterior regeneration is dependent on the presence of the central nervous system, while posterior regeneration can occur independently. The research also explores the regeneration of the nervous system and the formation of heteromorphic forms in the species.
